title: Quick World News - Breaking US News App
description:
Get the latest Breaking News and latest headlines and daily articles.
Would you like to read different news sources in one app? Tired of visiting news sources one by one?
Then, Quick World News is up to you!
You can read all news sources in Quick World News in one click.
The Best US Breaking News app!
SHOWCASE:
Top World & US News App provides many major media publishers:
BBC, CNN, Reuters, ABC, USA Today, New York Times, Fox News, U.S. News, The Guardian, India Today, Business, ESPN Sports, The Verge, Engadget, TechCrunch, Wired, The Wall Street Journal, Bloomberg, Forbes, ESPN, CBS Sports, National Geographic and many more.
NEWS CATEGORIES:
• Breaking News
• US news
• Politics
• Technology & Science
• Business
• Sport
• Podcast & diverse
FEATURES
- More than Million news sources in one app
- View content feeds in its original website
- Top story articles
- Read news by categories such as; business, technology, science, sport and diverse
- Listen podcasts, watch video news
- Read latest breaking news
- Home screen widget
- Offline news reading
- Dark and light theme
Quick World News is a smart news aggregator for you!
Download this free news app now!
